committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and the Environment

official_title: A bill to amend the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to make it a federal crime to carry or otherwise introduce or cause to be introduced any dangerous weapon or other dangerous instrumentality onto sites regulated by the Nuclear Regulatory Commission.

summary.text: Amends the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to authorize the Nuclear Regulatory Commission to issue regulations with respect to dangerous weapons or instruments or trespassing on installations subject to its licensing authority.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to make it a federal crime to carry or otherwise introduce or cause to be introduced any dangerous weapon or other dangerous instrumentality onto sites regulated by the Nuclear Regulatory Commission.
